title: Chabad Kinnus Hashluchim Gala
body: Over 6,500 Chabad-Lubavitch emissaries gather for the annual Kinnus Hashluchim gala, honoring Rabbi Moshe Kotlarsky z”l with a dedicated Sefer Torah. The event showcases resilience and outreach under extreme circumstances.

title: Netanyahu Honors Fallen Soldier
body: Israeli PM Binyamin Netanyahu attended a Torah dedication ceremony honoring Dr. Moshe Yedidya Leitner, a Shaldag unit reservist major killed in Gaza. Leitner was the son of Israel's US ambassador Yechiel Leitner.
